snippet: The groundbreaking contract that Newark and its teachers’ union have hammered out offers reason for hope that the quality of teaching will improve.
abstract: Editorial applauds groundbreaking contract agreed to by Newark and its teachers' union; contends contract offers reason for hope that quality of teaching will improve.
lead_paragraph: The groundbreaking contract that Newark and its teachers’ union have hammered out offers reason for hope that the quality of teaching will improve.

headline.seo: School Reform in Newark With a New Teachers’ Contract
